resources.string: A life dedicated to sport that I can not contemplate in another way, our body is the only thing we will have until the last day, we should take care of it . This goes much further, it is not just about training and having experience, but about trying to understand what happens in our body to know how to plan a workout.

For this I studied the career in Sciences of Physical Activity and Sports for 4 years and I also trained as NSCA-CPT as a personal trainer. I was always very competitive. In 2017 I decided to compete in men\'s physique junior getting a first place in interterritorial IFBB and second in the regional championship of the Region of Murcia. In 2018 I competed in my first international. Now I intend to help the maximum number of people, to achieve their dream of achieving a better physical with these plans after years of study and experience, since the Personal consultancies are complete and I want to continue helping.
